name: Literally Infected: Homer, Odyssey, Book 5, 2000/2021
description: Berlin based artist Artist Markus Wirthmann created a series of graphic works starting in 2000 by using literary texts as source code for graphics. Here it is the fourth of twentyfour books of Homer's Odyssey, which was written around the 8th or 7th century BC. Now, in 2021, he has minted an NFT.
